original_title: Def Leppard: Acoustic Night Secret Gig - Tokyo, November 11th 1995
overview: The first show in this city since June 1992 on the Adrenalize tour. This show was taped for a TV special called 'Def Leppard Acoustic Night' on WOWOW TV which also featured a full band interview between some of the songs which was shot during the day.
title: Def Leppard: Acoustic Night Secret Gig - Tokyo, November 11th 1995
